The rustic ambiance and friendly service make it a favorite among locals and tourists alike. • La Merenda (Nice): A small, cozy restaurant serving authentic Niçoise cuisine. The menu changes with the seasons, ensuring fresh and flavorful dishes. Reservations are a must due to i ts popularity and limited seating. • Chez Etienne (Marseille): Known for its simple yet delicious pizzas and grilled meats, this family -owned restaurant is a local favorite. The lively atmosphere and hearty
